Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone design showing how two students use it to communicate over a distance.
The student can illustrate how sound travels through the string using arrows or lines in their drawing.
The student can identify and label the components of the string telephone, such as cups and string.
The student can show the importance of using sound as a method of communication in their illustration.
The student can include a label or note explaining why this device helps people communicate over a distance.
